location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Extract of letter No. 3986 from the Acting Secretary to Government of Bombay

mods.abstract: Extract of the lettter in which the Governor in Council approves of Pelly's proceedings and entitling him to the Government's 'cordial commendations' for the successful negotiations with the Sultan of Muscat regarding the extension of the Mekran line of Telegraph.
